modName: The Honey Spirit - Liquor Shop in Solitude
summary: A small liquor shop between The Winking Skeever and Angelines Aromatics.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]
[i][center][color=#ff7700]Deutsche Übersetzung von Urusha[/color][/center]
[/i] 
The other day I saw a [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2107579-surprised-this-mod-doesnt-exist/]request[/url] for a liquor shop in Solitude, and I figured I could give it a try. So here it is.

The file has been cleaned with TES5EDIT, [b][u]REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE AND DRAGONBORN[/u][/b], is fully navmeshed and has no scripts, so it should be safe for everybody to use. Still, you should always make a backup save before installing ANY mod, in case something goes wrong.

French translation available [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/bordeciel/villes_et_villages/le_magasin_dalcool_de_solitude]here[/url]! Thanks, Sita!


[color=#1E90FF]== WHAT IS THIS THEN?==[/color]
As I said, it's just a liquor shop called The Honey Spirit, that can be found in Solitude, in the little nook between The Winking Skeever and Angeline's Aromatics. The merchant here works all day, selling all of the alcoholic drinks that I found in the game files from both Hearthfire and Dragonborn (with the exception of a couple of unique quest-related things). I hope I didn't miss anything, but if I did, please let me know. That's all there is to it, no new drinks or recipes added.

Beautiful video showcase by Slothability. Thanks! The mod is at 4:00.
[youtube]MdrHD5Ax2jc[/youtube]

And another video showcase by Nozi87. Thank you! The mod is at 2:53.
[youtube]hN6kUnpTgTc[/youtube]

This mod should be compatible with other mods that edit Solitude, as I am using several (about 6) with no problems. But, if you find some issues with other mods you may be using, please let me know so I can list them here.

Compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58055/?]JK's Solitude[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58110/?]Dawn of Solitude[/url] (just need to use the console to disable a wagon). Thanks for testing, everybody!


[color=#1E90FF]== NOTES ==[/color]
Yes, you cannot steal the drinks from the store. During testing, taking one would make the whole cell's items to slowly drift away while steadily dropping framerate. I know there's probably something that could be done to fix it, but they cannot be taken. Deal with it~

As this was a request, [u][b]I WILL NOT MAKE ANY CHANGES[/b][/u]. I will not move it, add to it or substract from it. [b][u]The mod is offered as-is[/u].[/b]


[color=#1E90FF]== INSTALLATION ==[/color]
To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Or you can use the Mod Manager to download the mod automatically. To uninstall, simply delete the files from your Data folder, and you're good to go.


[color=#1E90FF]== CREDITS==[/color]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?]Modders Resource Pack[/url] by Oaristys and Tony67.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?]FoodContainer[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14135]BookSets[/url] Resources by Blary.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12394/?]Celtic Decor for Skyrim I [/url] by DarkRider.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34969/?]Strotis Ovens Resource[/url] by Stroti and Tamira.
- [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1452-insanitys-folded-blankets/]Folded Blankets[/url] by InsanitySorrow.
- [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1300-ready-clutter-and-furnishings/]Ready Clutter and Furnishings 1.1[/url] by Lilith.
